product_name: Emotion Kayaks Crush Stand Up Paddleboard with Paddle - 8' - Kids'
long_description: Specially designed for kids up to 130 lbs., this entry-level paddleboard lets your young one get out on the water with a durable and stable platform and an adjustable paddle.
short_description: Specially designed for kids up to 130 lbs., this entry-level paddleboard lets your young one get out on the water with a durable and stable platform and an adjustable paddle.
